means: 使转移[向]( divert的过去式和过去分词 )
改变（资金、材料等）的用途

sentence.Network_en: During the strike, ambulances will be diverted to private hospitals.
sentence.Network_cn: 在罢工期间，救护车将被转到私人医院去。

sentence.Network_en: We diverted a plane to rescue 100 passengers.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们让一架飞机改变航线去营救100名乘客。

sentence.Network_en: The capital remained jammed with diverted traffic.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管实行了交通分流，首都依旧很堵。

diverting agent 分流剂diverting device 分散装置diverting means 分流工具

entry.def: To divert vehicles or travellers means to make them follow a different route or go to a different destination than they originally intended. You can also say that someone or something diverts from a particular route or to a particular place.

example.ex: ...Rainham Marshes, east London, where a new bypass will divert traffic from the A13...
example.tran: 伦敦东部的雷纳姆泽，那儿有一条新的旁道将会分流 A13 公路的交通

example.ex: During the strike, ambulances will be diverted to private hospitals...
example.tran: 在罢工期间，救护车将被转到私人医院去。

entry.tran: 改变(资金、资源)的用途;转移
entry.def: To divert money or resources means to cause them to be used for a different purpose.

example.ex: The government is trying to divert more public funds from west to east.
example.tran: 政府正试图将更多的公共基金从西部转到东部。

example.ex: ...government departments involved in diverting resources into community care.
example.tran: 负责将资源用于社区保健的政府部门

entry.def: To divert a phone call means to send it to a different number or place from the one that was dialled by the person making the call.

example.ex: He instructed switchboard staff to divert all Laura's calls to him.
example.tran: 他让总机接线员将劳拉所有的电话都转给他。

example.ex: Customers will only incur additional call charges if the call is diverted outside the UK.
example.tran: 只有当电话被转接到英国之外，客户才会被加收额外的电话费。

entry.def: If you say that someone diverts your attention from something important or serious, you disapprove of them behaving or talking in a way that stops you thinking about it.

example.ex: They want to divert the attention of the people from the real issues.
example.tran: 他们想要把人们的注意力从真正的问题上转移开。

example.ex: The President needed to divert attention away from his own economic record.
example.tran: 总统需要将人们的视线从他以往在经济上的表现上转移开。

auth_sentence.res_content: Petrol was diverted to the emergency relief effort.
